amendment.description: Amendment requires that more than 50 percent of the components in end products purchased by the Department of Homeland Security be mined, produced, or manufactured inside the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 21 printed in part B of House Report 109-84 to strengthen the "Buy America Act" and restore the original intent that more than 50% of the components in end products purchased by DHS shall be mined, produced, or manufactured inside the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Manzullo amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
